metadata.title: CVE-2022-47695 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered Binutils objdump before 2.39.3 allows attackers tocause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts via functionbfd_mach_o_get_synthetic_symtab in match-o.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47695` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm3
binutils-multiarch - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm3
binutils-source - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm3
binutils-static - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm3').
